title: Making Sense of UFOs, Conversations from the Edge
description:
The UFO phenomenon is back in the news in a major way with recent revelations and an upcoming US government report set to drop in the next few weeks.

Trying to understand the phenomenon is a challenge to Sensemaking, and one that Layman Pascal wrestles with together with Sean Esbjorn Hagens through the discipline of Exostudies.

https://www.exostudies.org/

We are hosting regular conversations like this in the Rebel Wisdom Digital Campfire, including upcoming sessions with the likes of Rupert Sheldrake, Dennis McKenna and many more. See here for more: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/campfire-events
